page.title: 05 MONKTON FARLEIGH CHURCH.
page.content: On Friday 7th June Jeremy,Tahli, Lesley and Jesse went down to {St.Peters Church}to interview {Reverend Derek Smith.}We asked him about the church. The church is{800 years old. Then we asked him if there were any {special features}of interest. There are some important{name stones}on the church walls, and a{Norman arch and an{Elizabethan wooden pulpit. There have been{58 Rectors}including Rev. Smith. Then we asked him what he did in his{spare time.}He goes and {visits}people who are ill,{teaches people before confirmation and{takes {assemblies.}He said it is fun to be a Rector in modern times.He says it is difficult being Rector of three parishes-{Winsley, Monkton Farleigh and{South Wraxall:}you have to travel a lot and make new friends.
